answers.answer: Hi Keith,Sorry to hear you aren't feeling well.It is unlikely that the leg/foot pain is related to the lightheadedness when you stood up.  Chest tightness at rest in bed is not a typical symptom of chest pain related to heart artery blockages, but probably merits a face to face evaluation by a doctor.  If you haven't seen a doctor in recent years, it is probably time for a check up.  It sounds like your family has some relatively significant health problems and you would benefit from screening to evaluate for these conditions.That is about all I can offer, but again would encourage you to see your doctor.Hope you feel better soon.

If you are interested their is a natural product that has been proven very effective in reversing heart disease and preventing sudden cardiac death and heart attacks by safely and effectively unclogging blocked arteries it can be found at it truly is and amazing product.   www.newheartandbody.com  good luck.

question: Male 38yrs sit at work and home on pc 74kg 5ft 6inAbout a year ago I had numb feeling in arms at night this went away then the other day I had numbness and small amount of aching in my left leg from just above the knee to my foot.Wasnt a feeling of pain in my bones or mussles. At night I get slightly tight chest and the veins in my neck feel restricted.The leg thing seemed to go away to some degree after walking.I also have had a few spells where I lost a small amount of balance after getting out of bed it didnt feel like the one that most people get from standing up to quickLungs have the smallest feeling of water in them but I dont think they have.Im not sure of the problem and I wasnt sure what forum to go tobut choose this oneFamily historyType 2 diabetes    grand motherHeart bypass       DadTesticle removed  and bladder cancer  DadArthritis rymotoid  mother grand fatherBulging blood vesile in brain twice once clamped and second timeA coil 25yrs later   MotherHigh blood pressure  MotherI havnt been to the doctor :( but Will try to go there before I die :)Any advice would be appreciated
title: Tight chest in bed veins in neck feel restricted
